data.name: qr_description
data.value: Once you have added this two factor code to your app of choice, enter a valid code below to finish the setup process

data.name: qr_title
data.value: Here is your Two-Factor QR code

data.name: backup_description
data.value: These codes will allow you to regain access to your account if you ever lose access to your 2FA device

data.name: backup_description2
data.value: Save these codes somewhere because otherwise you may be locked out of your account

data.name: disable_2fa_description
data.value: To disable two-factor authentication, enter a correct code from your authenticator app.

data.name: 2fa_required
data.value: You are required to setup 2FA because of your role within this instance.

data.name: 2fa_description
data.value: Enter a valid 2FA code to continue

data.name: 2fa_backup_description
data.value: Alternatively, you can click {0}here{1} to enter one of your backup codes
